en.title: [Nov 2024] Malaysian Economic Indicators
en.description: Leading, lagging, and coincident composite indices (with diffusion) showing overall economic direction.
en.description_email: DOSM has released the latest leading, coincident, and lagging economic indicators. The Leading Index increased by 2.5% year-on-year in Nov 2024 (Oct 2024: 1.7%), albeit with diffusion of only 28.6%, indicating that the increase was driven by just 2 out of the 7 components of the index.

bm.title: [Nov 2024] Penunjuk Ekonomi Malaysia
bm.description: Indeks komposit pelopor, serentak, dan susulan (termasuk difusi) menunjuk prestasi ekonomi secara am.
bm.description_email: DOSM telah menerbitkan indikator ekonomi pelopor, serentak, dan susulan terkini. Indeks Pelopor telah meningkat sebanyak 2.5% tahun ke tahun pada Nov 2024 (Okt 2024: 1.7%), tetapi dengan nilai difusi 28.6% sahaja, menunjukkan bahawa peningkatan tersebut didorong oleh hanya 2 daripada 7 komponen indeks tersebut.
